place.name: SPROUSTON
place.gazetteerText: Sprouston, par. and vil. with ry. sta., on NE. border of Roxburghshire - par. 8635 ac., pop. 1026; vil., near river Tweed, 2 miles NE. of Kelso; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
